results.title: Metformin attenuates sevoflurane-induced neurogenesis damage and cognitive impairment: involvement of the Nrf2/G6PD pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuates @CHEMICAL_Sevoflurane @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077149 @@@sevoflurane@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neurogenic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001750 @@@neurogenesis damage@@@ and @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@: involvement of the @GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_83619 @@@Nrf2@@@/@GENE_G6PD @GENE_24377 @@@G6PD@@@ pathway.

citations.NLM: Fan P, Lu Y, Wei H, Wang K, Jia P, Zhang Y, Zhang Y, Wang T, Yang L, Zhao J, Zhang S, Lu H, Chen X, Liu Y, Zhang P. Metformin attenuates sevoflurane-induced neurogenesis damage and cognitive impairment: involvement of the Nrf2/G6PD pathway. Metab Brain Dis. 2023 Apr 29;():. PMID: 37119382

results.title: A concealed history behind the disaster: Extremely rare presentations of metformin toxicity in a patient with body dysmorphic disorder
results.text_hl: We presented here a case of a 36-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who developed several presentations with diverse features during three years comprising @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neurogenic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001750 @@@neuropathic symptoms@@@, severe @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, three episodes of @DISEASE_Shock_Cardiogenic @DISEASE_MESH:D012770 @@@cardiogenic shock@@@, @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@, @DISEASE_Anemia_Megaloblastic @DISEASE_MESH:D000749 @@@megaloblastic anemia@@@, @DISEASE_Pancytopenia @DISEASE_MESH:D010198 @@@pancytopenia@@@, and @DISEASE_Hyponatremia @DISEASE_MESH:D007010 @@@hyponatremia@@@ and did not receive a definite diagnosis after each presentation until when she inadvertently disclosed her abuse of extremely unusual doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ during these three years with aim of @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight reduction@@@ obsessively without knowing that her symptoms could pertain to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@.

citations.NLM: Hajsadeghi S, Gholizadeh Mesgarha M, Pour Mohammad A, Saberi Shahrbabaki A, Talebi A. A concealed history behind the disaster: Extremely rare presentations of metformin toxicity in a patient with body dysmorphic disorder Toxicol Rep. 2022;9():848-851. PMID: 36561946
citations.BibTeX: @article{36561946, title={A concealed history behind the disaster: Extremely rare presentations of metformin toxicity in a patient with body dysmorphic disorder}, author={Hajsadeghi S and Gholizadeh Mesgarha M and Pour Mohammad A and Saberi Shahrbabaki A and Talebi A}, journal={Toxicol Rep}, volume={9}, pages={848-851}}

results.title: Mitochondria and the Repurposing of Diabetes Drugs for Off-Label Health Benefits.
results.text_hl: This review describes our current understanding of the role of the mitochondria in the repurposing of the anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes drugs@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Gliclazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005907 @@@gliclazide@@@, @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1 receptor@@@ agonists, and SGLT2 inhibitors for additional clinical benefits regarding unhealthy aging, @DISEASE_Post_Acute_COVID_19_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D000094024 @@@long COVID@@@, @DISEASE_Intellectual_Disability @DISEASE_MESH:D008607 @@@mental@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neurogenic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001750 @@@neurogenerative disorders@@@, and @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@.

citations.NLM: Yip JMX, Chiang GSH, Lee ICJ, Lehming-Teo R, Dai K, Dongol L, Wang LY, Teo D, Seah GT, Lehming N. Mitochondria and the Repurposing of Diabetes Drugs for Off-Label Health Benefits. Int J Mol Sci. 2025 Jan 3;26(1):. PMID: 39796218
